name: helpmetest-cli
description: HelpMeTest CLI tool for health check monitoring

scripts.build:all: bun run clean && bun run build && bun run build:binary
scripts.build:linux-x86: echo 'Note: Using x64 binary for i386 compatibility' && bun build src/index.js --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile=dist/helpmetest-linux-x86 --minify
scripts.build:windows-arm64: echo 'Note: Using x64 binary for ARM64 compatibility' && bun build src/index.js --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile=dist/helpmetest-windows-arm64.exe --minify
scripts.build:windows-x86: echo 'Note: Using x64 binary for i386 compatibility' && bun build src/index.js --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile=dist/helpmetest-windows-x86.exe --minify
scripts.release:local: bun run clean && bun run build:linux-x64 && bun run build:darwin-arm64

author: HelpMeTest
